title: v2.19.0 is ready
content:
Features:
  - Precise move tool
  - Drawing tools can do color replace

Enhancements:
  - Gradient generator can ignore source colors
  - Lowered color helper's minimum color count to 2
  - Handy joystick's position is persisted across sessions
  - Some enhancements to color replace
  - Some enhancements to sprite sheet import
  - Some enhancements to text tool
